OOC: hmm...  time for a councicular (is that a word) debate.  personally... 
as long as the power isn't used to directly move another bot (paralyzation is 
a different matter) and it doesn't result in that bots death ie: somehow 
escapable, i have no objections.  This does not mean that you must be told 
how to escape.  there just has to be room to.

--part1_c6.115359e7.2aac0752_boundary
